snippet.title: N.E.O.N. Never Ending Onlaught of Nerds - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
N.E.O.N. (Never Ending Onlaught of Nerds) is free to play on itch.io!
https://screenwave-games.itch.io/neon

WELCOME TO NeCON! We've missed going to in-person events this past year and feel the isolation, so we decided to replicate the convention experience! You are a famous cosplayer and influencer, and it's your job to smile for the camera... with a Never-Ending Onslaught of Nerds! (...Hey, that's us!)

How long can YOU last before things get... Awkward?!

Snap your way through hordes of excited fans!
Rack up points and top your high score!
Feel the awkwardness!

Developer/Publisher:
Screenwave Media Games

Lead Designer:
Sam Beddoes (FreakZone Games)

Additional Design:
Iván G. Lago (@ivangonlag), David Biggs, and Ryan Schott

Programming:
Iván G. Lago (@ivangonlag), Sam Beddoes (FreakZone Games)

Pixel Art and Character Design:
Anthony Carlson (@LuckySoftworks)

VOICES:
Cosplayer: Shellah
Announcer: David Biggs
Nerds: Sebastian Todd, Mika E. D. Mitchell, Karl Howe, Shellah, Sam Beddoes

Additional Support
Xander Arnot, Brandon Littlepage, and Tara Tomaino

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ScreenwaveGames
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/screenwavemediagames/
Join the Discord: discord.gg/u2xSz8AT2z
